content: at the body of the sweater to match 43 46 50 54 58 64 68 74 80 86 92 back stitches sample shown - i designed this sweater to have crisp but open ribbing it s not meant to cinch at 94 100 108 116 124 136 144 156 168 180 192 the waist or cuffs i also made sure to block the stitches on needle top half of the turtleneck as wide as i could for a really relaxed fold rather than a tight cowl © tanis fiber arts 2019 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only www tanisfiberarts com
